title: [Obsidian Acropolis, Observatory]
description: The pleochroic fire obsidian walls of the observatory arc skywards to support a magnificent glass-domed ceiling that suspends an intricate whirling kelyn orrery.  Commanding the precise center of the spherical expanse, a towering veil iron telescope vigilantly surveys the eternal heavens above.  Etched along the barrel of the telescope are dozens of detailed star charts and elaborate constellation maps, while a complex clockwork astrolabe hangs from its extended black diamond eyepiece.

The pleochroic fire obsidian walls of the observatory arc skywards to support a magnificent glass-domed ceiling that suspends an intricate whirling kelyn orrery.  Commanding the precise center of the spherical expanse, a towering veil iron telescope vigilantly surveys the glinting celestial bodies in the eternal heavens above.  Etched along the barrel of the telescope are dozens of detailed star charts and elaborate constellation maps, while a complex clockwork astrolabe hangs from its extended black diamond eyepiece.
